title: Missions not showing up
body:
I did not bother to complete any of the initial VS/order/chaos missions, out of boredom I guess (even though it was just changing an icon, but still, not the point). Now, no more missions show up for me.

What is this about? Is it a bug? Did I just lose my right to get missions just because I did not do the initial three? Maybe there are no more missions yet?

Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Those missions were specific to the [versus ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017)event, which is now over.  There's another set of missions right now, though, if you have Kayn unlocked.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Yes, thank you! I just saw some people having missions like get 400 cs and thought that they were generic and not event-specific.
I've got as similar problem, but I don't have any missions showing up at all.
It doesn't look like you have Kayn unlocked.
